name: Monk
details: Monastic training has taught you martial arts and allowed you to hone your mind, body, and spirit to new heights.

pf2t.name: Monk
pf2t.body: Monastic training has taught you martial arts and allowed you to hone your mind, body, and spirit to new heights.

name: Monk Dedication
details: You become trained in unarmed attacks and gain the powerful fist class feature (page 156). You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in monk class DC.
special: You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the monk archetype.

name: Basic Kata
details: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat.

pf2t.name: Basic Kata
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication

- - -

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat.

#### Basic Kata Leads To...
Advanced Kata

name: Monk Resiliency
prerequisites: class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
details: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting monk archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.

pf2t.name: Monk Resiliency
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier

- - -

You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting monk archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.

name: Advanced Kata
details: You gain one monk feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your monk level is equal to half your character level.
special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another monk feat.

pf2t.name: Advanced Kata
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Basic Kata

- - -

You gain one monk feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your monk level is equal to half your character level.

name: Monk Moves
details: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you're not wearing armor.

pf2t.name: Monk Moves
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication

- - -

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you're not wearing armor.

name: Monk's Flurry
details: You gain the Flurry of Blows action (page 156).

pf2t.name: Monk's Flurry
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication

- - -

You gain the Flurry of Blows action.

#### Flurry of Blows
Make two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally. As it has the flourish trait, you can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

name: Perfection's Path
prerequisites: expert in at least one saving throw
details: Choose one saving throw (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) in which you are an expert. Your proficiency rank in the chosen saving throw increases to master.

pf2t.name: Perfection's Path
pf2t.body:
**Archetype** Monk
**Prerequisites** Monk Dedication; expert in at least one saving throw

- - -

Choose one saving throw (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) in which you are an expert. Your proficiency rank in the chosen saving throw increases to master.
